question.title: springdoc-openapi-maven-plugin Compatibility Issue
question.body:
I've been running into the following error when trying to build the project:

[INFO] --- springdoc-openapi:1.5:generate (integration-test) @ tra-admin-service ---
[ERROR] An error has occurred
java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused

I've been investigating possible solutions, and based on what I’ve found, it appears this issue may stem from a compatibility problem between springdoc-openapi-maven-plugin and Spring Boot v3. Here's a relevant Stack Overflow thread that outlines the problem: 404 error on Swagger UI with Spring (springdoc-openapi configuration)

To troubleshoot, I’ve tried the following steps:

Referred to the official springdoc-openapi documentation - https://springdoc.org/

Used the plugin installation guide from springdoc plugin setup - https://springdoc.org/plugins.html

Reviewed another relevant thread: Unable to generate Swagger.json file using springdoc-openapi-maven-plugin, where I attempted to add the configuration to match the project's port (8011) -

Despite these efforts, I haven’t had any luck resolving the issue.

Anyone encountered something similar or has any insights or suggestions on how to address this?
